body: @t-vi I'm fine with caching `_v`. Admittedly `_v` can be much larger than `_u` (especially when on conv weights, but I don't think that the memory increase will be too bad. Please go ahead implementing this if you want to. But be aware of #8170 which might have merge conflict with your patch.
